Detailed Description

Definition at line 44 of file ByteArrayOutputStream.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::ByteArrayOutputStream ( )

Constructs a new ByteArrayOutputStream with a default size of 32 bytes.

If more than 32 bytes are written to this instance, the underlying byte array will expand.

gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::ByteArrayOutputStream ( int32_t  size) [explicit]

Constructs a new ByteArrayOutputStream with a default size of size bytes.

If more than size bytes are written to this instance, the underlying byte array will expand.

Parameters:
sizeinitial size for the underlying byte array, must be non-negative.
virtual gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::~ByteArrayOutputStream ( ) [virtual]

ByteArrayOutputStream Destructor.

gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::ByteArrayOutputStream ( const ByteArrayOutputStream &  o) [private]

Member Function Documentation

void gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::close ( ) [virtual]

Closes this stream.

This releases system resources used for this stream.

Reimplemented from gaia::storage::OutputStream.

ByteArrayOutputStream& gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::operator= ( const ByteArrayOutputStream &  o) [private]
void gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::reset ( )

Resets this stream to the beginning of the underlying byte array.

All subsequent writes will overwrite any bytes previously stored in this stream.

int32_t gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::size ( )

Returns the total number of bytes written to this stream so far.

Returns:
the number of bytes written to this stream.
base::ByteArray gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::toByteArray ( )

Returns the contents of this ByteArrayOutputStream as a byte array.

Any changes made to the receiver after returning will not be reflected in the byte array returned to the caller.

Returns:
this stream's current contents as a byte array.
base::String gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::toString ( )

Returns the contents of this ByteArrayOutputStream as a string.

Any changes made to the receiver after returning will not be reflected in the string returned to the caller.

Returns:
this stream's current contents as a string.
base::String gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::toString ( int32_t  hibyte)

Returns the contents of this ByteArrayOutputStream as a string.

Each byte b in this stream is converted to a character c using the following function: 

 c == (char)(((hibyte & 0xff) << 8) | (b & 0xff))

. This method is deprecated and either toString() or toString(const gaia::base::String&) should be used.

Parameters:
hibytethe high byte of each resulting Unicode character.
Returns:
this stream's current contents as a string with the high byte set to hibyte.
base::String gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::toString ( const base::String &  enc)

Returns the contents of this ByteArrayOutputStream as a string converted according to the encoding declared in enc.

Parameters:
enca string representing the encoding to use when translating this stream to a string.
Returns:
this stream's current contents as an encoded string.
void gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::write ( const base::ByteArray &  buffer,
int32_t  offset,
int32_t  len 
) [virtual]

Writes len bytes from the byte array buffer starting at offset offset to this stream.

Parameters:
bufferthe buffer to be written.
offsetthe initial position in buffer to retrieve bytes.
lenthe number of bytes of buffer to write.

Reimplemented from gaia::storage::OutputStream.

void gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::write ( int32_t  oneByte) [virtual]

Writes the specified byte oneByte to the OutputStream.

Only the low order byte of oneByte is written.

Parameters:
oneBytethe byte to be written.

Implements gaia::storage::OutputStream.

void gaia::storage::ByteArrayOutputStream::writeTo ( const OutputStream &  out)

Takes the contents of this stream and writes it to the output stream out.

Parameters:
outan OutputStream on which to write the contents of this stream.
